items.badge_description: Want to enjoy a day of brews, but need to keep your wits sharp? There are plenty of delicious brews under 5% for you to sip on throughout the day. That's 465 different beers with an ABV of 5% and lower.

beer.beer_description: A beautifully balanced beer, fruity by nature, with a well-rounded body and the suggestive echo of Crystal Malt.

items.badge_description: 99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 20 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 5!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 20 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 5!

items.badge_description: You're getting the hang of it, but there’s much more to try. That’s over 50 unique brews!
Traveling the world is hard, but not for you. It's as easy as cracking open a new brew! You have had a beer from at least 35 different regions around the world. Try 5 more for Level 8!
Had enough tea and biscuits? Head to the pub for a pint! That's at least 40 beers from the UK. Try 5 more for Level 9.

While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 25 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 6!
